prerequisite: Trained in Intimidate, at least one Arena Fighting feat, any martial class
name: Arena Champion
text: Forged in battle, tempered in cheers, and quenched in the blood of countless foes, you are an arena champion. Your lot is to fight for the favor of the crowds, to entertain them with the violence you know all too well. You have faced vicious beasts and battled scores of savage brutes plucked from the untamed frontiers. It makes no difference to you. Your job is to dispatch each one with flair and skill, to please onlookers with your showmanship. You are their champion, and you aim to make sure your name lives on in the hearts and minds of those who adore you.

features.awingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point, each enemy you hit this turn takes a -2 penalty to defenses until the end of your next turn
features.studyFoe(11thLevel): Whenever you take the total defense action, you gain a bonus to your next attack roll equal to half your Charisma modifier or half your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn
features.seizeOpening(16thLevel): Whenever you successfully use Bluff to gain combat advantage in combat, you can make a basic attack against that target as a free action

flavorText: One hundred battles have I fought, and each time I have emerged victorious. The crowds shall drown you with their cries. Thirsty sands shall drink your blood. Make peace with your gods, for I intend to speed you to them.
